value.desc: Model of the component defining the split ratio percent (0.0 < x < 100.0) between panes; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'input' event) OR use v-model directive

model-reverse.desc: Apply the split size value to the second pane (by default it applies to the first)

model-pixels.desc: Apply the split size in pixels (by default is percent)

horizontal.desc: Allows the splitter to split its two panes horizontally, instead of vertically

limits.desc: An array of two values representing the minimum and maximum split size of the two panes; Use Infinity as the second value to make it unbound on the upper side

before-class.desc: Class definitions to be attributed to the 'before' panel

after-class.desc: Class definitions to be attributed to the 'after' panel

separator-class.desc: Class definitions to be attributed to the splitter separator

separator-style.desc: Style definitions to be attributed to the splitter separator

dark.desc: Applies a default lighter color on the separator; To be used when background is darker; Avoid using when you are overriding through separator-class or separator-style props

default.desc: Default slot in the devland unslotted content of the component; Suggestion: QTooltip, QMenu

before.desc: Content of the pane on left/top

after.desc: Content of the pane on right/bottom

separator.desc: Content to be placed inside the separator; By default it is centered

input.desc: Emitted when component's model value changes; Is also used by v-model

value.desc: New model value (0.0 < x < 100.0) defining the ratio between panes
